name: view_profile_picture
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_profile_picture_viewer.
Tool description: Fetch Full HD Profile Picture and Some Basic Details of anyone on Instagram.








Tags: Instagram Insta Profile Info DP Details Insta DP Insta Profile Photo
API description: Retrieve the full HD profile picture of a specified Instagram user by their username.

username.description: The Instagram username of the user whose profile picture is to be retrieved.
